title: ABUCCIMA advocates national programme for entrepreneurs
content:
The president of Abuja chamber of Commerce and Industry (ABUCIMA), Mr. Tony Ejinkeonye has urged the federal government to expedite actions on the promotion of entrepreneurship amongst graduating students of tertiary institutions as well as encourage constant energy supply to power small and medium scale industries as part of measures aimed at addressing unemployment and […] 
 
The post appeared first on Daily Times Nigeria Newspaper . 
 
Source: Daily Times Business
